item.description:
Take the good metars when you can get them, that's what I always say!

Wednesday looks good.... Let's decide on either Barnes again. Outside dining... or Parlin for Mexican...
Anyone wanna come along? Meet about 5:15 - 5:30, wheels off the ground and get back by 9ish.....

Bring any passengers you want... Could be a good one! drive by my hangar Building 13, or call my cell. We can co ordinate. I'll also monitor 123.45 in case someone is running late...

Charley

http://www.aopa.org/m...

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: Pre Fourth Fly out for dinner. Outside dining at Barnes? Or Parlin?
